sentences.en: a dreadful accident
sentences.cn: 可怕的事故

sentences.en: a dreadful mistake
sentences.cn: 可怕的错误

sentences.en: Are you all right? You look dreadful.
sentences.cn: 你还好吧？你看上去十分疲惫。

sentences.en: Dreadful doubts began to enter my mind.
sentences.cn: 我开始产生了可怕的怀疑。

sentences.en: Film critics are dreadful moaners.
sentences.cn: 影评人都是些让人非常反感的牢骚满腹的人。

sentences.en: Finally, making a dreadful mess, they devour the fruit.
sentences.cn: 最后，他们狼吞虎咽地吃起了水果，果汁滴得到处都是。

sentences.en: I cannot imagine what to do in this dreadful situation.
sentences.cn: 我不能想像在这么糟的情况下该怎么办.

sentences.en: I feel absolutely dreadful about what has happened.
sentences.cn: 我对已发生的一切感到极其失望。

sentences.en: I had a dreadful headache.
sentences.cn: 我头痛欲裂。

sentences.en: I must apologize for the dreadful mistake I made.
sentences.cn: 我为我所犯的严重错误深表歉意.

sentences.en: Michelle felt absolutely dreadful (= very ill ) .
sentences.cn: 米歇尔感觉病得很厉害。

sentences.en: My typing is quite dreadful.
sentences.cn: 我的打字水平非常差。

sentences.en: The victim suffered a dreadful injury and lost a lot of blood.
sentences.cn: 受害者受了重伤，大量失血。

sentences.en: These dreadful people bring down the tone of the neighbourhood.
sentences.cn: 这些讨厌的人败坏了这一地带的风气.

sentences.en: They suffered dreadful injuries.
sentences.cn: 他们严重受伤。

sentences.en: They told us the dreadful news.
sentences.cn: 他们告诉了我们那糟糕透顶的消息。

sentences.en: We all shudder at the thought of the dreadful dirty place.
sentences.cn: 我们一想到那可怕的肮脏地方就浑身战惊.

sentences.en: We’ve had some dreadful weather lately.
sentences.cn: 最近我们这里的天气糟透了。

sentences.en: We've made a dreadful mistake.
sentences.cn: 我们犯了个极大的错误。

sentences.en: What a dreadful thing to say!
sentences.cn: 话说得太难听了！
